medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea, chest pain, dyspnea, and general malaise.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began two weeks before admission with nausea, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, and night sweats. Symptoms intensified despite treatment, which included antibiotics and antipyretics.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Poorly controlled diabetes mellitus, heavy alcohol intake (4 U/day), and excessive smoking (Brinkman index 900).
medical_history.social_history: Heavy alcohol use and excessive smoking.
